title: kayako font
content:
Hi, I'm looking for the font used in kayako logo. Any help is appreciated.

-Chris

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [kayako font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141230235857/http:/typophile.com/files/kayako%20font.jpg) | 8.72 KB |
author: Relevant Logo

comments.content: Already tried to identify it recently with no success (can't find the previous request). The only "alternative" I've found was [Gaden Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20141230235857/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/schizotype/gaden-sans) but that's far from being even loosely similar unfortunately...
Thanks Ryuk. If anyone else has any font suggestions, please share. Thanks much
